title.rendered: Podcast: Rob Shapland joins DirectorsTalk Podcast: Attack 5: How to Hack a Company

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1621849183916{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Join our Head of Innovation, Rob Shapland as he continues his series of Breaching the defences webinars with DirectorsTalk.

Attack 5: How to Hack a Company[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html]JTNDaWZyYW1lJTIwdGl0bGUlM0QlMjJ2aW1lby1wbGF5ZXIlMjIlMjBzcmMlM0QlMjJodHRwcyUzQSUyRiUyRnBsYXllci52aW1lby5jb20lMkZ2aWRlbyUyRjU1MzIzMTU1MiUyMiUyMHdpZHRoJTNEJTIyNjQwJTIyJTIwaGVpZ2h0JTNEJTIyMzYwJTIyJTIwZnJhbWVib3JkZXIlM0QlMjIwJTIyJTIwYWxsb3dmdWxsc2NyZWVuJTNFJTNDJTJGaWZyYW1lJTNF[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
